website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive toy fully supports whichever easy-to-assemble, yet detailed dinosaur they want to build first, making it the perfect introductory LEGO set.
pros: Build your choice of a tyrannosaurus, triceratops, or pterodactyl
cons: You’ll have to fully disassemble your dinosaur if you want to build another

customer_reviews.title: Great set. My daughter loves it (6 years old).
customer_reviews.text: One of the best LEGO sets of its size. Sturdy enough to actually play with without it falling to pieces (and that's saying a lot when it's a T-Rex). Sure, a claw or foot might pop off, but nothing catastrophic. I am buying another set to keep for the next time one of my daughter's friends has a birthday party. Any kid who likes dinosaurs and LEGOs (which is all of them, right?) should love this set.
customer_reviews.author: KCJones

customer_reviews.title: Unboxing Video: Mighty Dinosaurs | Lego Creator | T-Rex is building up an appetite for blocks! | ToyBop with Annaeee!
customer_reviews.text: So Cool... So Fun! Provides hours of fun for kids and builders!! 3 instruction booklets, one for each Dinosaur design build. Pros: Great design and features for dino lovers Moving arms, legs, tails, and mouths Check out our unboxing video for a closer look! -- Thanks for watching ToyBop with Annaeee!
customer_reviews.author: ToyBop with Annaeee!

customer_reviews.title: 4 Year Old Boy LOVES the bones & claws!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this set. Admittedly, because he is 4 years old, we only got about a quarter of the way through the construction before having to take a break. He then decided he would prefer to turn what we had constructed into a spaceship instead of the dinosaur, and took creative reign at that point, but I think in a year or so, he will have the patience to actually complete this as designed. In spite of not using it as designed, the kit is really cool, and he absolutely loves the claws and bones, etc and uses them with his other lego sets.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This didn't take long to put together, but my son loved it, despite being solely interested in Ninjago Legos usually. I believe his exact words were, "It's cool, mom." For the price, I'd say that's a win. I wish the rest of the Mighty Dinosaurs collection was as reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: BridgettTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: So creative
customer_reviews.text: The people at Lego are amazing, this kit is the most creative of any I've ever seen or dreamed of. The ball joints give the creations a very lifelike range of motion, my 5 yo son loves these.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite lego sets so far. And so well priced!
customer_reviews.text: My sons have many, many lego sets. This is definitely one of my favorites. The details are amazing (especially the teeth and claws). We have only assembled it as the t-Rex so far, but it is so cool. This is a no brainer for any 4-6 year old (girl or boy) birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Arakashi

customer_reviews.title: good set of builds with a 4th one too!
customer_reviews.text: this is actually a 4n1. you can find the 4th set of directions on lego.com/creator. My son loves this. Good selection of builds. Sometimes when you buy creators there are cool build and others that aren't as cool. My son loves all 4 of these! He wants more of these sets so he can have a dino collection so he doesn't have to take a part.
customer_reviews.author: LcharapichTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best and Most Versatile Lego Sets
customer_reviews.text: I got a couple of these sets and was impressed by the versatility of the pieces. Y 3 year old was able to complete the models with a little assistance. Lego.com also provided additional instructions to build a diplodocus, dinosaur airplane, and anklosaurus. Another website had instructions for a mantis and baby dragon (see picture). This set complements other retired sets such as Ferocious Creatures and Mythical Monsters. No doubt, Lego will release something similar in a couple years. I can't recommend paying more than $18 for this set though. For $20 or more, there are plenty of others you can get and which have more pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Malarky51

customer_reviews.title: 7 in 1!! My 3 years old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 years old is into Legos and dinosaurs! This is perfect! Instructions is very easy to follow. Pictures are very clear. My son looks at the book and builds it on his own. I help him to take all apart to build another dinosaurs. It said 3 in 1 but actually 7 in 1!! Bonus dinosaur, scorpion, and air plain instructions are online. Tips: Before you start, separate all the blocks into colors and shapes. It saves so much time and energy to find right blocks. And it’s easy for my 3 years old to find them and builds them on his own.
customer_reviews.author: E & K

customer_reviews.title: Great dinosaur set
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic Lego set. My son had me buy it for him with some of his birthday money, and he's had to share it with my 3yo. The three different dinosaurs in one set thing is seriously awesome, and I really don't mind being asked to transform the thing into a new dinosaur. (I like putting Lego together even at 38, heh) Each dinosaur has a lot of moving parts, which gets a bit frustrating since it comes apart easily, but that's also what makes it really cool. My younger son's face lights up whenever he sees the "new" dinosaur. Very clever design, and I'll definitely buy others like it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Lots of use at this price point, really a 4-in-1 set
customer_reviews.text: We're a LEGO family, have a bunch of sets, but this 3 in 1 set has gotten a lot of use. One thing that made it even better was a fourth set of directions you can get online as a PDF to make a brachiosaurus-type dino. Will definitely check out more of these 3-in-1 sets in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Batz

customer_reviews.title: I hope you have a lot of time.
customer_reviews.text: So my 5 year old got this for a gift. I spent an hour building the Dino. After some blood, sweat, tears, & cursing there was a fierce Dino...who was in pieces 5 minutes later from the 2 year old. Good luck. Then you have to take apart and rebuild for another Dino and then another. Yeah 3 in 1. Good luck parents of less than 7, that's why it has ages listed because lego knows what they are doing. This beast is in the closet for 2 plus more years.
customer_reviews.author: JWW

customer_reviews.title: They play with it nonstop - they of course think you can build all three at the same time which has been fun to explain over and over and over again - ...
customer_reviews.text: Boys will not stop playing with this. Albeit my 3 and 5 year old are still a bit young to put it together themselves; my 5 year old has tried and needs minimal help. They play with it nonstop - they of course think you can build all three at the same time which has been fun to explain over and over and over again - but once they tire of T-Rex, they get the Tri-tops.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: These Kego kits that are dinosaurs or cars or whatever are pretty cool. But dont expect a young child to be able to put them together and once your done putting it together dont expect it to stay that way. They fall apart and unless your carefully watching pieces get lost and soon its a worthless pile of pieces. Ive always loved legos. Got my first set in the early 70s. They fun to create, but these have alot of pieces that are good for nothing if you cant keep every piece toether as the item its supposed to be
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Brown of Heber

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew. I thought you would be able to make all three Dinosaurs but you can only make one. If you want to make the other two you have to disassemble the one you made. So if you really wanted all three Dino’s at the same time you’d have to buy three of these kits. That being said, with some adult help, my 4yo nephew was able to assemble this kit. For independent assembly I’d stick to the box suggestion and your good judgement :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: MY GRANDSON ABSOLUTELY LOVES LEGOS AND DINOSAURS
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves this lego creator set. We made the T-Rex but it also can create the T-Rex, Pteradactyl, and Triceratops. Although we lost 2 pieces, we ended up making the T-Rex but lost one piece for connecting the head to the spine and one set of teeth...he still can play with it. He loves that there are moving parts==the head, mouth, spine, legs, hands and tail. If it is possible to get replacement parts so that it could be complete, I would greatly appreciate that. But if not, my grandson still loves to play with it the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my "nephew" who is 6. We spent the good part of the night (maybe 90 mins) putting together the T-Rex. There are many small pieces (but they were all there). He did need a little help putting together. You know how kids are.. just dive in and not bother with pictures/instructions. Once it was together he played for hours. You can also put it together to form a Pterodactyl and Triceratop. I'm sure he'll be doing those soon. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift
customer_reviews.text: We have given this as a gift and for our kids. It's great to have options on building legos to show them it doesnt have to be just 1 thing and to use their imagination. These 3 in 1 legos are a great idea cause kids can get bored with building it the same over and over. This way they have options to build something different and the instructions are easy to follow just dont throw then away!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: so youi need spread them out and sort them so you will have them easy to find when needed
customer_reviews.text: SO far we have been able to build only one of the three figures. One thing though...is that this pieces are so tiny.....so youi need spread them out and sort them so you will have them easy to find when needed.....My 4 year old lost patient so I had to build one from scratch and he still would not fully participate. I think, toddlers would like bigger rather than smaller animals, because it is easier for them and they do not have the patient we adults do have to focus entirely in sorting out every small part of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kreshnik B.

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! I did not initially realized that you can only make one of the dinosaurs at a time, but upon closer inspection that was my error, so I’m keeping the 5 star review. The different dinosaurs are a good challenge for the 5 to 10-year-old range. Also, when one of the pieces broke, we contacted LEGO online and they send us a new piece. It’s nice for a company to stand by their work!
customer_reviews.author: R. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Makes 3 dinosaurs- Totally cool- worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about Lego and Dinosaurs? Perfect match! I bought this for my 6 year old son and he out it together with ease- not the boring kind of ease but the confident step by step independent ease we gain when we are having a good time and “in the flow” It was delightful not to be “MOM, I need help” every 3 minutes and to stand and exclaim my pride and congratulate him on a job well done! LEGO is a life line for parents everywhere and I am grateful my son has LEGO as a hobby and tactile learning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 year old son and his eyes lit up since he loves dinosaurs. It can be constructed into 3 different builds and keep him busy for hours. He loves it and it's low price point makes it a great option for an affordable lego gift. They make a similar one called "creatures" that he also has so he likes that he has 2 transforming legos sets now. I would definitely buy this product again for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: This is a Christmas GIFT !
customer_reviews.text: This is a CHRISTMAS GIFT . . . for a person far away ! whose child likes dinosaurs ! (Christmas has still not happened, yet.) Thank you for the prompt and excellent service of the delivery. Lego should be difficult to assemble. The whole idea is to challenge the participant in the project ! Lego doesn' t fail and is a fine intellectual stimulus for us as human beings. Yours truly, June E.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: One of Lego’s BEST 3 in 1 sets.
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Very cool idea! Awesome that you can make three very good and simple iterations of completely different dinosaurs. The Bad: There weren’t more like this. There are other 3 in 1 sets but not as intuitive as this dinosaur set. Would have loved to see other favorites like Brachiosaurus, stegosaurus, Spinosaurus and others. The Ugly: Not much. Decent value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: DIGITALid

customer_reviews.title: LEGO my legos
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, Charlie, had already received one of these and I was unaware. But he was thrilled to receive another. The box states that you can build one of three or some such wording and he was disappointed the night before that he could only build one and he'd have to take it apart to build one of the others. So when I gave him one from me, he was thrilled, he got to build another. Kids are crazy for legos and want to build all they can.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun Lego set
customer_reviews.text: My son is in love with this set. He just turned 6 and he can make all 3 by himself. Some pieces fit very firm so he asks for help sometimes with disassembly. This has kept him entertained way more than I anticipated. He makes one, plays with it for a bit then takes it apart and makes another one. Def a great lego set!! I hope they make more like it.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Fun build!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't done a Lego project for 20+ years and I was feeling nostalgic so saw this kit and thought it looked pretty cool. I love the concept of the 3-in-1 sets! Directions were easy to follow and the end result looks great! I've only made the T-rex so far but can't wait to try the other variations! Great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: GrooveMerchant

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. No use a present anymore. Really disappointed, I should have listened to the reviews. Not the first time this happens apparently
customer_reviews.author: Elke

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 in 1 build
customer_reviews.text: Our little one enjoyed putting this together over a couple of sessions with a little help on pressing some of the pieces together and some help following along with the very clear instructions as long as we focus on what we are doing and at the end she was very proud of her velociraptor that she built. These 3 in 1 lego builds are awesome. Have already purchased others to build.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended - lots of fun for a little dough
customer_reviews.text: These "triple" build it yourself kits are some of the best bang for your buck in Lego-dom. My elementary and pre-teen kids have both enjoyed building and rebuilding the dino and shark kits. These are well realized and highly articulated designs. A of of play for little cash, for young kids and more sophisticated builders.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set at a great price - with the 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set at a great price - with the 3 in 1 builds I feel like even though it's a low piece count (174) it's worth so much more. You can make T Rex, Triceratops or Pterodactyl; and there's a bonus Brontosaurus on the lego website. I may buy a second one so we can have two built at once to "fight" each other. It makes a great birthday present for a kids party too; throw in a mystery minifig bag or two and you've got a perfect gift at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fun set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for just under thirteen dollars for my 9 year old son's birthday. He has several lego sets but was excited about this one being dinosaurs & literally jumped up & down when he opened it. I liked that he had instructions to make different dinosaurs & it has fun pieces for making whatever else your imagination leads you to build. I'd recommend for any lego fan.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Age appropriate for creative six-year-old
customer_reviews.text: I love it that Amazon.com shows toys that are age-appropriate. After an email confab with the parents about the child's interests, I select a gift that I can be sure the child will enjoy. This has worked out very well and I recommend it for any gift-givers who are some distance from their giftees.
customer_reviews.author: HazelnutTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew LOVEDDD this set. It was extraordinarily hard to put together the dinosaurs though; but I'm not really good at stuff like that. My girlfriend is thankfully and my nephew was able to help her and understand because they do have pictures/instructions for each dinosaur you can build. You only have enough pieces to build one dinosaur at a time, though. JFYI.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Really great product.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set because of the versatility. You can make 3 different dinosaurs with the instructions provided. There are also 2 more dinosaurs online you can make which you can find using the code on the box. We also found an airplane and a scorpion. It's been great fun for my son.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic LEGO set! Simple enough for kids to do with very little help but difficult enough to keep them busy for hours assembling it and playing with it afterward! I also love the fact that they can take it apart and choose to build another model as it comes with 3 instruction booklets.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This set is a lot of fun, and a good buy for the cost. It was purchased for a 3 year old, so he definitely needed help building it but he could pick out a lot of the pieces and complete simple tasks. It makes a fun dino to play with once assembled - just be warned that you will want to order three sets so you can assemble all three dinos at once without having to disassemble/reassemble the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Fun set, good for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Our 4yr old son loved the different dinosaurs so much we ended up buying several sets so he could play with them all together. The set was likely beyond his level to put together himself, but he did enjoy tinkering with them after we’d built them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy for my 4 year old grandson to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy for my 4 year old grandson to put together. The guides that come with Legos these days make it so much simpler! And, what 4 year old doesn't like Dinosaurs. I need to get two more of these since you can make three dinosaurs with this kit. My grandson puts one together and plays with it. He wants to make all three. The price is perfect for the Lego brand and the purchase of multiple sets!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome small LEGO kit
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! It makes 3 different dinosaurs and is not hard to build. My 5 year old daughter built the T-Rex right away. It took a little while but she completed it. The only thing is you have to keep all extra pieces segregated from your other legos so you can switch up the dino’s.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: A fun gift that can be remade again and again
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my son. He has been very occupied with it making it in the different design instructions provided. Then when those were exhuasted we found many additional alternate builds online. He's chosen to gift it to a friend now who he knows also likes dinos!
customer_reviews.author: electrickitten

customer_reviews.title: A Great Set
customer_reviews.text: The models have great articulation and the colors are vibrant. It's a lot of fun to build and play with. The T-rex is, of course, the best model out of the included instructions. With the most articulation and a more realistic body you can stomp around in your lego world as you get on the floor and do the dinosaur
customer_reviews.author: Jubilant

customer_reviews.title: ... got this for Christmas and it has been his favorite toy. He and my 4 year old have ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old got this for Christmas and it has been his favorite toy. He and my 4 year old have played with it every single day. They build them and them take them apart and rebuild them. Th have built cages for them with their Legos and had the best time. We love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this the first time a couple of years ago, I was in charge of getting the birthday cake for my grandson's first party with all his friends. I put this together, which was fun for me, and put him top of the birthday cake. Big, big hit! And my grandson had another lego set to play with. I bought this again for my youngest grandson and he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Strawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Dino loving kiddo!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to play with this toy... I mean give this gift to one of our favorite kiddos who loves dinosaurs just as much as I do. Plus we can make different Dinosaurs! I haven’t opened it yet, but the box came in without being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to gift for little boys
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 and has this set. You can make 3 different dinosaur options with it. Not at the same time though! This is our go to gift for little boy birthday parties. Just bought another one for a PTO fundraiser.
customer_reviews.author: ALW

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur Lego pieces that enhance the fun
customer_reviews.text: My son really loved this. He had been making dinosaurs out of Legos before he got this, but he didn't have the parts to make moving mouths and so forth. He really latched onto these and has been making all sorts of dinosaurs since. (No Kragle in this house... His imagination runs free in Lego building)
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Giessel

customer_reviews.title: Love the 3 dinosaurs-in-1 option.......
customer_reviews.text: There are so many Lego options available but I purchased a couple boxes of these Mighty Dinosaurs to donate to a children's hospital because the child will have a choice of which dinosaur to build. I like the creative involvement that comes into play when you have options. Great product, good Amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old approved!
customer_reviews.text: My son spent his Christmas money on three of these because he loves the dinosaurs so much he doesn’t want to take them apart to make a different one. He’s five and can mostly build these without help, which is a nice way to keep him occupied on a rainy afternoon!
customer_reviews.author: rachindc

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his surprise. It’s super fun and easy to understand the directions. We had fun building all the designs together. There is a surprise Dino design that you have to find the instructions for. We found them on YouTube. Overall I think it was worth it. This quarantine is becoming difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Iris2019

customer_reviews.title: Love Lego's this one is no exception
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased Lego's for my 3 sons and just love them. Now I purchase lego's for my 3 grandsons. This 3 in one is amazing. You can make 3 entirely different dinosaurs with this kit. Lego's you've done it again. Nice toy and nicely designed. Very happy with this purchase and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Aurelio

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old son loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 1/2 year old son loves this! He spent a fair amount of time reading the instructions and putting this together which he has never done before! He just said it was "super duper fun it really was I give it a 5 out of 5" so there you have it out of the mouth of babes :) lol
customer_reviews.author: SpiritualHealer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for a 6 year old boy. He was very happy. Had it put together with minimal help within a couple hours and then played with the finished result the rest of the evening. Neat set.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaurs LEGO, what not to love!
customer_reviews.text: With such a variety legos are more popular than ever, especially if your little guy likes dinosaurs. Three different models, keeps the excitement going. I gave this to a 4 year old even though it says 7-12. No problem, but they’ve been taught to read the directions on their own since they first got legos.
customer_reviews.author: miss book

customer_reviews.title: Grandson gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson’s 11th birthday. He had been wanting it for some time. Had it together in no time - which is one of his goals - how fast he can do it - and he enjoys playing with it afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: bolton

customer_reviews.title: Only for EXTREME model builders...not for kids.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re buying this for an adult that enjoys the challenge of putting together extremely intricate toys with tiny, tiny parts then, by all means, get it! However, this is not for average children or adults, for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's 8th birthday. He was ecstatic when he opened this present and put it together immediately. There are three different dinosaurs you can assemble: T-Rex, Tricertops and Pterodactyl. All types look fantastic when assembled and have moving parts. An excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! It’s really 6 in 1!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorites because you can go to LEGO website and download a total of 6 different building instructions!! Best value of any LEGO I’ve purchased!! Best kept secret out there!!
customer_reviews.author: Jezabel Llorente

customer_reviews.title: It's actually a 7-in-1 Creator set! Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This set, hands down, is one of the best if not the best 3-in-1 Creator set you can get. First of all, what kid does not love dinosaurs. But what makes this set really stand out is that there are actually 7 builds you can make. In addition to the T. Rex, triceratops and pterodactyl, you can download from the LEGO website additional instructions for a brachiosaurus (I think), an ankylosaurus, a scary scorpion and a Dino Island recon plane!
customer_reviews.author: fayvstar

customer_reviews.title: Great little LEGO project for 5-7 yo
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy! If your kid is into legos and dinosaurs it’s a must buy. Everything moves - legs, arms, feet, neck, and even jaws. I was very impressed how well thought through this model is. Side note: even though the package says 7-12 year olds, this is more like 5-7 year olds difficulty level. My 5 year old worked on it for 2 nights.
customer_reviews.author: KayC

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set for a dinosaur fan
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift for a kid who loves dinosaurs, and it was a big hit. He really liked that you can build three different dinosaurs with the same blocks, and it's quickly become a favorite toy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BEP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my 10 year old. The directions were easy to follow and with it being a 3 in one, he has had hours of fun with it. Now he is creating new assembles with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 9-year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: I keep toys, books, art projects, etc around the house for visiting grandchildren! My just turned 9-year old grandson is excited about coming over in a few days and work on assembling the 3 dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.author: Jean C

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Directly from my 6 year old son "I like that it can be three different dinosaurs. I like that it's made out of Legos. It's so much fun. It's like a challenge to put them together that I like. The Triceratops is my favorite."
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! I help my 4 years old child ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product ! I help my 4 years old child to build it. Very good experience. I had a very good time with him constructing this LEGO together. I highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: Lego Dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: For the dinosaur lover who thinks Legos are pretty neat what can you say. It was a bit of a challenge for the 6 yr old but Mom and Dad helped and now the process is down pat.
customer_reviews.author: Threats o. his life lead go an unexpected connection  to family previosly unknown. a journey to s.e

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loved putting this set together. He loves legos and loves the challenge. Instructions are very clear. Love that he can take it apart and rebuild as 3 different dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I am quite satisfied with it you can make 3 different Dinosaurs from the one kit and it is sturdy and my grandson has taken it apart and remakes a different one and it has stood up very nicely and we are going on 3 months now of lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: IndyGrl

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: legos are expensive - I am happy that these are a model that you can take apart and put back together in various different ways. I will purchase more like this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thayer

customer_reviews.title: awesome set
customer_reviews.text: i like how many alt builds this set has you can even build a transformer from this i built a transformer from this set i built a triple changer out of this the only downside with these lego sets is the pieces break easily
customer_reviews.author: kaleb tussing

customer_reviews.title: Package was opened
customer_reviews.text: Well, the only complaint I have is the giant hole in the side of the box, but nothing so far seems to be missing and everything is there. This was a gift for my step son so I hope he enjoys it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Danielle E.

customer_reviews.title: Early xmas present
customer_reviews.text: Got this a few months back as an xmas present for my son who loves legos. He enjoys following the step by step directions and seeing how long it takes him to build the item. I cant wait for him to see the new lego stash I got him this year. We shall soon see as the legos are up in my closet
customer_reviews.author: Chucklyduckly

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, exactly what product advertised. For kids no younger than 6.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. I didnt see the age range before buying. Yes its for kids no younger than 6, it is very advanced building. But we built them for my kids and they still love it and think its super rad to have a big lego dinosaur.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The box was terrible but the toy is great.
customer_reviews.text: The product is GREAT! I bought one for my daughter and she loves it. The only bad review I have is that when this one arrived the box was badly destroyed. This was for a birthday present and it looks like I got it used. Kinda embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: jensim

customer_reviews.title: Had lots of fun with my nephew with this
customer_reviews.text: Had lots of fun with my nephew with this. FYI - you can build 3 different dinosaurs, but can only make one at a time. So he was a little disappointed that we had to take the first one apart to make the next one. Still a lot of fun and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Brigance

customer_reviews.title: Fun LEGO Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent LEGO product. 7 year old son has tons of fun putting together and playing with. Fairly easy for him to put together. I recommend it for kids 7 and above.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond 3rd

customer_reviews.title: 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Lego connoisseur boyfriend. I can't tell a Lego apart from an eggo, so I cant personally speak to the quality of this product. However the boyfriend LOVES it. Says it's fun and durable. And other adjectives. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: LEGO dinosaurs what’s not to love
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 6 yo that’s alway playing cell phone games. It got him off the phone. He loved putting each dinosaur together. Instructions are easy to read and apply. Highly recommend if you have a dinosaur lover.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kindergarten age and above !
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for little Dinosaur lovers! Sparks imagination, helps exercise dexterity and is bright and cheerful. Arrived promptly and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: jean m.

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My six year old grandson really enjoyed this Lego because he could build it, take it apart, and then rebuild it as a different dinosaur. Price was reasonable for a Lego set.
customer_reviews.author: HML

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE FOR 3 IN 1
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to see how long it will take 9 year old great-grandchild to put one together. He want lego dinosaurs, he's getting lego dinosaurs. Thanks Lego !
customer_reviews.author: tyrelady

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter loves dinos
customer_reviews.text: when I got this I thought the box was awful small for containing 3 dinos. I got it for my granddaughter and she was happy with it. Got to work and built the first one and there were plenty of pieces left to build the other two. She's 7 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for my 8-year-old son!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Lego set my 8 year dole completed on his own and he loves it! His dad helped him to build the T-Rex to get a feel for Legos. The he completed the other two by himself. I knew I had scored when he woke up early Saturday morning to finish up one of the sets. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany A Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son to build with his dad. He is too young for this set, but he likes dinosaurs. He enjoyed helping/watching his dad build it. My husband enjoyed it too and liked that you could choose which dinosaur to build.
customer_reviews.author: Carey L. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of moving parts, very cool
customer_reviews.text: The kids had it put together pretty quick and loved it. The mouth, paws, arms, legs, tail all move and I'm sure theres more... they didnt let me play with it for very long after the leg mysteriously fell off lol
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Fun LEGO set.
customer_reviews.text: Great little LEGO set. My grandson loved it and enjoyed making it. I bought it when he came to visit as he loves LEGO. He’s 6 and made it himself. A challenge but doable!
customer_reviews.author: elinam

customer_reviews.title: Kids who are into dinosaurs will love this set
customer_reviews.text: Kids think this is soooo cool. Yes you can only make one dinosaur at a time. The teeth are pretty cool though. The TRex has all articulating joints. Our 4 year old needed quite a bit of help to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY COVETED yet affordable gift!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love legos?? I purchased for an Angle Tree gift for an 8 year old boy this year, its the perfect combination of kid desire, parental approval and reputable brand name! Package came timely, and in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: WEM

customer_reviews.title: First Set for the Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson will be 6 next week and he is really into dinosaur's. Saw this set and figured it was time to start with something other than Duplo's. Looking forward to giving him this on his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Holland

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for toys for tots and it was so cool I wish I had kids to buy gifts for as this would have definitely won me cool aunt points
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lego set
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased, the first one I made into a pterodactyl. I really wanted a T-Rex for my train layout. Lego make some awesome sets. I can't wait for the deep sea creatures to come out
customer_reviews.author: YTG

customer_reviews.title: Dinosuar Nut Grandson loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has too many toys, so it is difficult to find him something he likes. He was crazy about it and focused on this toy leaving his others aside to play with the legos.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie the reviter

customer_reviews.title: Not our favorite set
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES the LEGO City series and this set does not compare. He did not enjoy doing these and the pieces were very hard to keep together.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this. You can build up to 5 different dinosaurs with this set. I ended up buying more just so my child can have a few dinosaurs to play with
customer_reviews.author: IL Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Crushed box!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the Legos inside the box will look like, for a corner of the box was crushed. It's a gift and doesn't look like a gift.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This lego set is REALLY cool! And if your like me, dread building with those tiny blocks, easy!!! It 3 different dinos in 1 kit, and they all go together very easily. My son who's autistic built them himself.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I really love these 3 in 1 lego options. Although my son is excited to always build one out of 3 we have never broken it down to build another one. Very decent price especially for a bday gift for a lego lover you don't want to spend a ton of money on!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The hinged wings are awesome..
customer_reviews.text: My husband and 4 yr old son built this, and my kiddo loves the pterodactyl setup! The hinged wings are awesome... Let's him play with it some without breaking it. Definitely too tough for a 4 year old to put together alone as the box implies with the age group... just don't want to confuse anyone.
customer_reviews.author: EmmyLou

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for grandson who was absolutely thrilled with receiving it and couldn't wait to get started at putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: Three times the fun
customer_reviews.text: Neat lego set where you can do three different things with one set. Easy enough to do in a short amount of time but not boring.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: LEGO Creator Mighty Dinosaurs 31058 Build It Yourself Dinosaur Set, Create a Pterodactyl, Triceratops and T Rex Toy (174 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Your kids will engage in endless hours of creative play with this 3-in-1 LEGO Creator Mighty Dinosaurs set. The build and play set creates a T. Rex with dark-green and beige color scheme, bright orange eyes, posable joints and head, large claws and an opening mouth with pointed teeth. Kids will also have a chance to engage in creative play by building a Triceratops or a Pterodactyl from the same beige and dark-green bricks. Plus, this dinosaur toy is accompanied with dinosaur prey in the form of a buildable rib cage.
feature_bullets: Kids will enjoy embarking on dinosaur adventures with this 3-in-1 dinosaur playset that transforms into a Pterodactyl, Triceratops and T Rex Toy Each dinosaur toy will create hours of pretend play for kids

There are a variety of dinosaur accessories included, such as bright orange eyes, posable joints and head, large claws and an opening mouth with pointed teeth Plus, dinosaur prey that comes in the form of a buildable rib cage
Your kid can engage in creative play by building multiple green dinosaurs from this set of beige and dark-green bricks

This kids dinosaur toy creates a T Rex that measures over 4-inch (11cm) tall, a Triceratops toy that measures over 3-inch (9cm) tall and a Pterodactyl that measures over 1-inch (4cm) high, 7-inch (18cm) long and 9inch (25cm) wide
This LEGO Creator 3-in-1 kids dinosaur toy provides a unique build and play experience in which kids can play with a mix of dinosaur models Ideal for kids ages 7, 8, 9 and older

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars7,360 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
